title: £500.00 pw-4 bed in Westbourne Crescent, Lancaster Gate, W2  Ref: 143
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Westbourne Crescent, Lancaster Gate, W2
£500.00 Per Week
Ref: 1438

Property Details
Happy to offer this large 4 bed apartment with separate kitchen in prime location, Westbourne Crescent, Lancaster Gate, W2.

The property consists of:
* This light and spacious 4 bedroom top floor flat with a lift benefits from a well-proportioned separated kitchen and generously sized 3 double bedrooms with ample storage space and large bathroom (NO LOUNGE – CONVERTED INTO 4TH BEDROOM)
* Located on the top floor with a lift, the property is bright and full of new features due to a recent refurbishment
* Westbourne Crescent is ideally situated moments from the general amenities on Craven Road while Queensway and Notting Hill Gate are also close by providing a comprehensive selection of fashionable shops, restaurants and bars.
* The location is ideal – as well as restaurants and a corner shop being literally next door, we are just across the road from Lancaster Gate station and Hyde Park, Paddington is 5 minutes’ walk, with Edgware Road, Oxford Street and Queensway nearby
